doc.title: Video: G8 summit opens
doc.author: Guardian staff reporter
doc.description: Barack Obama and other leaders arrive in Italy for the start of the G8 summit hosted by Silvio Berlusconi

main.p: This article is more than 15 years oldG8 summit opensThis article is more than 15 years oldBarack Obama and other leaders arrive in Italy for the start of the G8 summit hosted by Silvio BerlusconiExplore more on these topicsG8Silvio Berlusconi
